To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RelativeStrengthIndex _rsi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rsi = RSI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rsi.IsReady)
{
    var averageLoss = _rsi.AverageLoss.Value;
    var averageGain = _rsi.AverageGain.Value;
    var current = _rsi.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rsi = self.RSI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rsi.IsReady:
    average_loss = self.rsi.AverageLoss.Value
    average_gain = self.rsi.AverageGain.Value
    current = self.rsi.Current.Value
